questions.question: What are the names of the two variants of SIFSIX-1-Cu reported in the study?
What method was used to collect single crystal X-ray diffraction data for TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
questions.answer: Bruker-AXS SMART APEX/CCD diffractometer using CuKα radiation

questions.question: How does the CO2 uptake of TIFSIX-1-Cu at 1 atm compare to that of SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
questions.answer: The CO2 uptake of TIFSIX-1-Cu at 1 atm is higher than that of SNIFSIX-1-Cu

questions.question: What is the primary adsorption site for CO2 in TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu according to modeling studies?
questions.answer: The primary adsorption site for CO2 is located at the pillar equatorial fluorine atoms

questions.question: True or False: The CO2–CH4 relative uptake of TIFSIX-1-Cu is lower than that of SIFSIX-1-Cu.
What effect does substituting Si4+ with Ti4+ in the pillar have on the sorbent–CO2 interaction in TIFSIX-1-Cu?
questions.answer: Substituting Si4+ with Ti4+ in the pillar enhances the sorbent–CO2 interaction in TIFSIX-1-Cu

questions.question: True or False: SNIFSIX-1-Cu has the highest CO2–CH4 selectivity at 1 atm among the variants studied.
What is the significance of the CO2–N2 IAST selectivity calculations for TIFSIX-1-Cu compared to SIFSIX-1-Cu?
questions.answer: The CO2–N2 IAST selectivity calculations show that TIFSIX-1-Cu has significantly higher CO2–N2 separation capability than SIFSIX-1-Cu up to 1 atm

questions.question: True or False: The BET surface areas of TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu are lower than that of SIFSIX-1-Cu.
What is the role of the pillar in the structure of TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
questions.answer: The pillar cross-links the square grid sheets formed by the bipy linkers and nodes, forming a pcu net with square channels

questions.question: True or False: The gravimetric CO2 uptake of TIFSIX-1-Cu at 0.15 atm is inferior to that of SIFSIX-1-Cu.
How does the CO2–N2 selectivity of TIFSIX-1-Cu at 1 atm compare to SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
questions.answer: The CO2–N2 selectivity of TIFSIX-1-Cu at 1 atm is higher than that of SNIFSIX-1-Cu

questions.question: True or False: The synthesis of TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu involves a high-temperature activation step.
What is the impact of the electrostatic nature of the pillars on CO2 capacity/selectivity in TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu?
questions.answer: The electrostatic nature of the pillars impacts CO2 capacity/selectivity by enhancing or reducing the interaction between CO2 and the pillars, affecting the overall performance of the materials

questions.question: True or False: The CO2 Qst at zero loading for TIFSIX-1-Cu and SNIFSIX-1-Cu is significantly different.
